usage:
Usage: gemini [options] [command]

Gemini CLI - Launch an interactive CLI, use -p/--prompt for non-interactive mode

commands.queryDescription: Positional prompt. Defaults to one-shot; use -i/--prompt-interactive for interactive.

mcp.demand: You need at least one command before continuing.

add.name: Name of the server
add.header: Set HTTP headers for SSE and HTTP transports (e.g. -H "X-Api-Key: abc123" -H "Authorization: Bearer abc123")
add.trust: Trust the server (bypass all tool call confirmation prompts)
add.description: Set the description for the server
add.includeTools: A comma-separated list of tools to include
add.excludeTools: A comma-separated list of tools to exclude
add.scopeHomeError: Error: Please use --scope user to edit settings in the home directory.
add.alreadyConfigured: MCP server "{{name}}" is already configured within {{scope}} settings.

nonInteractive.confirmShellExit: Exiting due to a confirmation prompt requested by the command.
nonInteractive.unsupportedResultExit: Exiting due to command result that is not supported in non-interactive mode.
nonInteractive.atCommandError: Exiting due to an error processing the @ command.

save.description: Save the current conversation as a checkpoint. Usage: /chat save <tag>
save.overwritePromptSuffix: already exists. Do you want to overwrite it?
save.noChatClient: No chat client available to save conversation.

resume.description: Resume a conversation from a checkpoint. Usage: /chat resume <tag>
resume.notFound: No saved checkpoint found with tag: {{tag}}.
resume.authMismatch: Cannot resume chat. It was saved with a different authentication method ({{authType}}) than the current one ({{currentAuthType}}).

delete.description: Delete a conversation checkpoint. Usage: /chat delete <tag>
delete.notFound: Error: No checkpoint found with tag '{{tag}}'.

share.description: Share the current conversation to a markdown or json file. Usage: /chat share <file>
share.invalidFormat: Invalid file format. Only .md and .json are supported.
share.noChatClient: No chat client available to share conversation.

options.prompt: Prompt. Appended to input on stdin (if any).
options.promptInteractive: Execute the provided prompt and continue in interactive mode
options.yolo: Automatically accept all actions (aka YOLO mode, see https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xvFZjo5PgG0 for more details)?
options.approvalMode: Set the approval mode: default (prompt for approval), auto_edit (auto-approve edit tools), yolo (auto-approve all tools)
options.experimentalAcp: Starts the agent in ACP mode
options.allowedTools: Tools that are allowed to run without confirmation
options.extensions: A list of extensions to use. If not provided, all extensions are used.
options.listExtensions: List all available extensions and exit.
options.resume: Resume a previous session. Use "latest" for most recent or index number (e.g. --resume 5)
options.listSessions: List available sessions for the current project and exit.
options.deleteSession: Delete a session by index number (use --list-sessions to see available sessions).
options.includeDirectories: Additional directories to include in the workspace (comma-separated or multiple --include-directories)
options.screenReader: Enable screen reader mode for accessibility.
options.outputFormat: The format of the CLI output.
options.locale: Locale to use for CLI messages and help output
options.fakeResponses: Path to a file with fake model responses for testing.
options.recordResponses: Path to a file to record model responses for testing.
options.promptDeprecation: Use the positional prompt instead. This flag will be removed in a future version.

errors.promptAndQuery: Cannot use both a positional prompt and the --prompt (-p) flag together
errors.resumeNeedsInput: When resuming a session, you must provide a message via --prompt (-p) or stdin
errors.yoloAndApproval: Cannot use both --yolo (-y) and --approval-mode together. Use --approval-mode=yolo instead.
errors.invalidLocaleMissing: Invalid locale value: expected a non-empty string
errors.unsupportedLocale: Unsupported locale "{{value}}". Falling back to English.

messages.localGit: Running from a local git clone. Please update with "git pull".
messages.npx: Running via npx, update not applicable.
messages.pnpx: Running via pnpx, update not applicable.
messages.bunx: Running via bunx, update not applicable.
messages.homebrew: Installed via Homebrew. Please update with "brew upgrade".
messages.pnpmAuto: Installed with pnpm. Attempting to automatically update now...
messages.yarnAuto: Installed with yarn. Attempting to automatically update now...
messages.bunAuto: Installed with bun. Attempting to automatically update now...
messages.npmAuto: Installed with npm. Attempting to automatically update now...
messages.localInstall: Locally installed. Please update via your project's package.json.

extensions.demandCommand: You need at least one command before continuing.

install.describe: Installs an extension from a git repository URL or a local path.
install.source: The github URL or local path of the extension to install.
install.ref: The git ref to install from.
install.preRelease: Enable pre-release versions for this extension.
install.consent: Acknowledge the security risks of installing an extension and skip the confirmation prompt.

errors.localRefNotAllowed: --ref and --auto-update are not applicable for local extensions.
errors.sourceMissing: The source argument must be provided.

logs.consentAcknowledged: You have consented to the following:

disable.name: The name of the extension to disable.
disable.scope: The scope to disable the extension in.

errors.invalidScope: Invalid scope: {{scope}}. Please use one of {{allowedScopes}}.

new.describe: Create a new extension from a boilerplate example.
new.path: The path to create the extension in.

logs.templateCreated: Successfully created new extension from template "{{template}}" at {{path}}.
logs.installHint: You can install this using "gemini extensions link {{path}}" to test it out.

crash.fileBug: Please file a bug report using the /bug tool.

add.restrictiveSandbox: The /directory add command is not supported in restrictive sandbox profiles. Please use --include-directories when starting the session instead.
add.missingPath: Please provide at least one path to add.
add.alreadyInWorkspace:
The following directories are already in the workspace:
- {{directories}}
add.geminiFilesAdded:
Successfully added GEMINI.md files from the following directories if there are:
- {{directories}}

wittyPhrases: Checking for syntax errors in the universe...
Just a sec, I'm debugging reality...
Crafting a response worthy of your patience...
Defragmenting memories... both RAM and personal...
Swapping bits... don't tell the bytes...
Greasin' the cogs of the machine...
Aligning the stars for optimal response...
Just a moment, I'm in the zone...
Preparing to dazzle you with brilliance...
Just a tick, I'm polishing my wit...
Hold tight, I'm crafting a masterpiece...
Just a jiffy, I'm debugging the universe...
Just a moment, I'm aligning the pixels...
Just a sec, I'm optimizing the humor...
Just a moment, I'm tuning the algorithms...
The truth is in here... somewhere...
Finishing the Kessel Run in less than 12 parsecs...
The cake is not a lie, it's just still loading...
Fiddling with the character creation screen...
Just a moment, I'm finding the right meme...
Finding a suitable loading screen pun...
Distracting you with this witty phrase...
Our hamsters are working as fast as they can...
Giving Cloudy a pat on the head...
I'm going the distance, I'm going for speed...
Is this the real life? Is this just fantasy?...
I've got a good feeling about this...
Doing research on the latest memes...
Figuring out how to make this more witty...
What do you call a fish with no eyes? A fsh...
Why did the computer go to therapy? It had too many bytes...
Why don't programmers like nature? It has too many bugs...
Why do programmers prefer dark mode? Because light attracts bugs...
Why did the developer go broke? Because they used up all their cache...
What can you do with a broken pencil? Nothing, it's pointless...
Searching for the correct USB orientation...
Ensuring the magic smoke stays inside the wires...
Rewriting in Rust for no particular reason...
That's not a bug, it's an undocumented feature...
I'll be back... with an answer.
My other process is a TARDIS...
Just remembered where I put my keys...
I've seen things you people wouldn't believe... like a user who reads loading messages.
What's a computer's favorite snack? Microchips.
Why do Java developers wear glasses? Because they don't C#.
Looking for an adult superviso... I mean, processing.
Buffering... because even AIs need a moment.
Entangling quantum particles for a faster response...
Polishing the chrome... on the algorithms.
Are you not entertained? (Working on it!)
Summoning the code gremlins... to help, of course.
Just waiting for the dial-up tone to finish...
My other loading screen is even funnier.
Pretty sure there's a cat walking on the keyboard somewhere...
It's not a bug, it's a feature... of this loading screen.
Have you tried turning it off and on again? (The loading screen, not me.)

clear.description: Clear the screen and conversation history

compress.description: Compresses the context by replacing it with a summary
compress.alreadyCompressing: Already compressing, wait for previous request to complete

add.description: Add directories to the workspace. Use comma to separate multiple paths

list.description: Show all directories in the workspace

cloudPaid.title: Vertex AI Notice
cloudPaid.noticeMid: are incorporated into the agreement under which Google has agreed to provide
cloudPaid.noticeRest: to Customer (the “Agreement”). If the Agreement authorizes the resale or supply of Google Cloud Platform under a Google Cloud partner or reseller program, then except for in the section entitled “Partner-Specific Terms”, all references to Customer in the Service Specific Terms mean Partner or Reseller (as applicable), and all references to Customer Data in the Service Specific Terms mean Partner Data. Capitalized terms used but not defined in the Service Specific Terms have the meaning given to them in the Agreement.

modelStats.noApiCalls: No API calls have been made in this session.
modelStats.title: Model Stats For Nerds

cli.promptInteractivePipeError: Error: The --prompt-interactive flag cannot be used when input is piped from stdin.

dns.invalidResolutionOrder: Invalid value for dnsResolutionOrder in settings: "{{order}}". Using default "{{defaultValue}}".

memory.relaunchRequired: Need to relaunch with more memory: {{targetSize}} MB
